About Us

Home

/ About Us

Story of CSSL

Leading Shelf Supplier

Commercial Shelving and Solutions Limited is a supplier and distributor of industrial and commercial shelving in Trinidad and Tobago. Our thrust is concentrated on supplying solutions for offices, warehouses and industrial complexes throughout Trinidad and the Caribbean region. Our sales specialists have over 15 years of experience in the material handling industry.

Their knowledge of the market and experience has seen the completion of many successful projects and satisfied customers. We are located in Macoya Industrial Estate in north Trinidad and can facilitate shelving installations effectively from our location.

Story of CSSL

Customer Focused

Along with our formidable experience in supply and installation, we are committed to becoming the most reliable and competitive supplier in the shelving industry. In doing so, we are prepared to implement from planning to completion, various Shelving systems from small to larger high capacity systems, be it steel storage shelves or Mezzanine systems.

Our company would be geared towards providing space utilization solutions for our customers. We also offer solution services whereby outfitting offices, warehouses and industrial complexes with the necessary solutions that would create for an effective and safe work environment.

Commercial Shelving and Solutions Limited’s aim is to become a leading shelving supplier with a philosophy in providing superior products and excellent customer service.
